name: Royalton Splash Riviera Cancun, An Autograph Collection Resort
address: Carretera Federal 307 Tulum-Cancun Km 332, 150, Municipio de Benito Juarez, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Catalonia Grand Costa Mujeres
address: Carr. a Punta Sam SM 6, Lote 6 Zona Costera, Zona Continental, 77400 Punta Sam, Quintana Roo
description: Catalonia Costa Mujeres All Suites & Spais a 5* family resort, full of life and situated at one of the most beautiful beaches of the Mexican Caribbean. Our QUINTA AVENIDA, inspired by the popular Quinta Avenida of Playa del Carmen, is the heart of our resort, harboring a great variety of innovative restaurants, bars and stores. Two large pools in different areas of the hotel, one of them destinated to those who look for relaxation, while the other offers a great variety of activities and fun for the whole family. Our comfortable rooms–all suites including several rooms with swimup pool, the wide gastronomic offer, our AlegríaSpa and a complete entertainment program, make this resort the ideal place for a wonderful vacation either as a couple or with the family. Local attractions include tours to Isla Mujeres and Holbox island. For those interested in Mayan culture we recommend a visit to the Mayan Museum and the archeological site “El Rey”, both located in Cancun hotel zone.FarePortal

name: Grand Fiesta Americana Coral Beach Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 9.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Location This excellent luxury hotel is situated directly beside the fine sandy beach on the Mexican Caribbean coast. The hotel lies in the tourist centre of Cancún, just a few minutes' walk from the town centre where guests will discover shops, boutiques, cafés, bars, restaurants and nightlife venues. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 602 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. A lift can be used to access the upper floors. Services such as a cloakroom, a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access (for a fee) and wireless internet access (for a fee) are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room, a café and a bar. The grounds of the establishment feature a playground and an attractive garden. Additional features of the establishment include a newspaper stand and a playroom. Guests arriving by car can park their vehicles in the garage (for a fee) or car park (for a fee). Among the additional services available are medical assistance, room service, a laundry and a hairdressing salon. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. A balcony or terrace comes with most rooms as standard. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. Each accommodation unit features a double bed or a king-size bed. Among the amenities are a safe and a minibar. Tea and coffee making equipment is included as standard. An ironing set is also available to guests. Most accommodation units are equipped with internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a CD player and an alarm clock. Wheelchair-accessible rooms are also bookable. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub, a spa bath and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. The poolside bar serves a selection of refreshing drinks. For those wishing to enjoy some exercise, tennis and beach volleyball are offered onsite. The establishment offers indoor sporting activities such as table tennis, or for a fee, a gym. The establishment offers various wellness options, including a spa and a sauna, or for a fee, a steam bath and massage treatments. An entertainment programme, an entertainment programme for adults, an entertainment programme for children and a kids' club provide guests with recreational options during their free time. Meals The establishment offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA, Diners Club, JCB and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

name: Occidental Costa Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan, Km. 4,5 | Cancún, Quintana Roo, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: 概述 4 星級住宿 可通往眾多當地景點。 海濱住宿 位置 位於 Cancun 郊區. Located in the heart of Hotel Zone 當地名勝 Isla Mujeres Ferry -.25 miles. Downtown Cancun - 3 miles. Plaza Flamingo - 3.75 miles. 休閒娛樂 設備齊全的健身中心 戶外游泳池 水上運動 兒童 兒童活動 提供兒童俱樂部 餐廳與休息室 4 Restaurants 3 酒吧 休閒餐廳 美食餐廳 一應俱全的酒吧/休息室 服務 24 小時櫃臺服務 有出租汽車服务 電梯 禮賓服務 會議設施 活動設施 住宿 358 間客房. 停車 提供飯店內停車WebBeds

name: Dreams Vista Cancun Golf & Spa Resort
address: Lote I-03 Manzana 12 Supermanzana 84, 77520 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Dreams Vista Cancun is an all-new, all ocean view, family resort! Set beachfront along the Caribbean Sea, there’s activities for the kid in everyone—a beautiful beach, four pools and watersports galore. The resort’s prime location is close to the wonders and ruins of the Mayan Riviera, and right next door to the Puerto Cancun Golf Club The brand new, modern rooms and suites at Dreams Vista Cancun all offer ocean views from a private, furnished balcony or terrace, an in-room mini-bar and more. Connecting rooms, family suites, and Sun Club upgrades are also available. All rooms and suites are non-smoking.WebBeds

name: Beach Palace
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 11.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel is situated in the leisure district of Cancún, just a short walk to the town centre, where guests will discover countless restaurants, shops and nightlife venues. Links to the public transport network are to be found directly outside of the hotel. This accommodation establishment comprises a total of 410 rooms and features a number of in-house facilities. The comfortable rooms come with an en-suite bathroom and are well-appointed with amenities to ensure a pleasant stay. In the outdoor complex, guests can enjoy a freshwater swimming pool and relax on a sun terrace. Sports enthusiasts may make use of the in-house gym and tennis facilities SMOKE FREE PROPERTYFarePortal

name: Hotel Maya Caribe Faranda
address: Blvd. Kukulcan KM.6, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring a private beachfront location and surrounded by tropical gardens, this Cancun hotel is minutes away from many area attractions and provides all the amenities needed for a relaxing stay. Hotel Maya Caribe Faranda Cancun is conveniently located a short drive from Cancun city centre. Guests can also easily discover restaurants, marinas, shops and a nightlife. A variety of water activities are also easily accessible. Relax in the beautiful surroundings in the Maya Caribe's spacious pool, overlooking the ocean. Enjoy a traditional Mexican dinner at the on-site restaurant and bar or plan the day's activities with help from the knowledgeable concierge staff. Rate does not include an eco-tax of US$1.55 per room per night, which must be paid upon arrival. By provision of the local municipality, the hotel charges a mandatory tax of $72.62 MXN or $3.9 USD per room, per night, payable directly at the property.

name: Grand Palladium Costa Mujeres Resort & Spa
address: Vialidad Paseo Mujeres, Manzana 1, Lote 10, SM 3, Cancun, Mexico, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: A sauna, an outdoor pool and 5-star accommodation are on offer at Grand Palladium Costa Mujeres Resort & Spa. It provides a gym, as well as massage services, a kids club and a playground. Rooms at Grand Palladium Costa Mujeres Resort & Spa are comfortable and provide a mini bar. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. Breakfast is available each morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of the rooms. Cancun International Airport is a 55-minute drive from Grand Palladium Costa Mujeres Resort & Spa. The resort's multilingual staff will ensure that every guest has an enjoyable stay.HotelsCombined

name: Adhara Hacienda Cancun
address: Av. Carlos Nader, Lotes 1,2,3, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: In the heart of Cancun, a short walk from popular sites, this hotel provides free shuttle service to the beach along with on-site dining options and many modern amenities. The Adhara Hacienda Cancun is located in a residential area of Cancun. Tulum Avenue, the financial district and a number of shopping centres are easily accessible. Beautiful beaches, offering a variety of leisure activities are also only a short shuttle ride away. Thoughtful amenities at the Adhara Hacienda Cancun include free Wi-Fi and a gift shop. Guests can also take advantage of the on-site fitness centre, complete with an outdoor swimming pool. Guests at the Adhara Hacienda Cancun can also enjoy on-site dining at Adhara Grill, serving Mexican and international cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

name: Crown Paradise Club Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Km 18.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located along the Caribbean Sea, this Cancun hotel is 3.5 km from Aqua World Marina. It features a water park with 8 water slides and The Spa offers hair and body treatments. Every spacious room offers balcony with beautiful ocean views and air conditioning. All rooms are brightly decorated and include a satellite TV, refrigerator and coffee maker. Guests can enjoy a poolside massage or relax in the hot tubs. A gym and 2 tennis courts are available for active guests. Crown Paradise Cancun offers free on-site activities, such as a mini-golf course and game room with billiards. A variety of cuisine is available at Club Cancun’s 7 restaurants, including Japanese specialties at Fujiyama and Italian dishes at La Piazza. Beer and cocktails are served at 6 bars, such as Club Caribe Pool Bar and Beach Bar.

name: Fiesta Americana Condesa Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulkan Km 16.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Cancun's hotel zone, next to one of the city's most beautiful beaches, this property offers enjoyable facilities and luxurious spa services with great views of Nichupte Lagoon. The family-friendly resort of Fiesta Americana Condesa Cancun consists of 3 main buildings, each sheltered by a palapa. Go swimming in the outdoor pool or spend the day at the beach. The hotel offers several eating options, including Argentinian dishes in San Telmo, Trattoria and Pizzeria offering typical Italian classics, Sushi Corner, Cantina offering the Mexican flavour, The Grill to enjoy your meals while also enjoying the outdoor view, a children's option at the Pirate Ship and for the adults La Cevichería, where they can snack and sip a refreshing beverage while watching their kids play. The Deli & Gift Shop is a relaxing corner where guests can enjoy a cup of coffee, a pastry and a good book. The Fiesta Americana's Miiluma Spa offers massage and beauty treatments. There is also a modern gym, and yoga classes are offered.

name: Dreams Sands Cancun Resort and Spa
address: Blvd. Kukulcan km. 8.5 Lote B, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Situated upon a white-sand beach in the heart of Cancun's hotel zone, Dreams Sands Cancun Resort & Spa is also 10 minutes' drive from the city centre. Guests are offered with gourmet dining, bars and nightlife entertainment, plus 2 swimming pools. The elegantly decorated rooms offer stunning views of the Caribbean Sea and Isla Mujeres. They include a full, spacious bathroom with luxury toiletries, a daily stocked minibar that offers beers, soft drinks and bottled water, and amenities including an iPod dock. Dreams Sands Cancun Resort & Spa boasts an equipped spa and fitness centre, and for children's amusement there is the Explorer's Club. The resort also features an outdoor hot tub, plus non-motorized water sports activities can be arranged by the Dreams Entertainment team. Guests will be able to choose between 9 different restaurant options, all offering gourmet cuisine. Four festive bars and lounges will serve a wide menu of unlimited top-shelf spirits. Guests can also perfect their swing at a nearby golf course with complimentary greens fees. Cancun International Airport can be reached in a 25-minute drive. Family friendly hotel, please see fine print for additional information.

name: Hyatt Ziva Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Manzana 51, Lote 7, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This stunning beachfront resort is set on the beautiful strip of Punta Cancun and framed by the Caribbean Sea, where you can enjoy a white sand beach and clear-blue waters. All rooms at Hyatt Ziva Cancún include a flat-screen TV, mini bar and a coffee machine. Rooms feature a private bathroom equipped with a shower as well as bath robes and slippers. Hyatt Ziva Cancun offers a variety of activities, from theater shows to water sports to tequila tastings and a microbrewery. Choose to lounge in a beach cabana, sip a margarita and enjoy diving, snorkeling, sailing, and swimming in the Caribbean. Soak up the sun at cascading pools overlooking the sea, including the pool bar. Enjoy the oceanfront spa, with a massage, holistic body treatments, hydrotherapy and a fitness center. Hyatt Ziva Cancun is located 300 metres from Coco Bongo while La Isla Shopping Mall is 3.4 km away. Cancun International Airport is 17 km away.

name: Royalton Riviera Cancun, An Autograph Collection Resort & Casino
address: Carr Federal 307 Tulum-Cancun Km 332.15, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Moon Palace Cancun
address: Carretera Cancun-Chetumal Km. 340, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Marriott Cancun Resort
address: Boulevard Kukulcan, Retorno Chac L-41, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Surrounded by the Caribbean Sea and situated directly on the beach, this elegant hotel offers luxurious accommodation and amenities including a spa and outdoor pool. Marriot Cancun Resort offers guests spacious rooms, private balconies and flat-screen TVs. Guests can also enjoy cuisine dishes in one of the hotel's 8 gourmet restaurants including Mikado Japanese Teppan Yaki and Sasi Thai. A variety of children's programs and a playground are offered. Marriot Cancun Resort features numerous water recreational activities and an on-site tour desk.

name: Kempinski Hotel Cancún
address: Retorno del Rey #36, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This Grand Hotel Cancun - Managed by Kempinski features 2 outdoor swimming pools, a spa and a private beach. It offers modern rooms equipped with an iPod docking station, CD player and cable TV. The centre of Cancun is 18 km away. Kempinski spa and Salon offers a wide range of massage therapies, body treatments and facials. There is also a gym and tennis court. Cabanas are available on the hotel’s private beach. The Grand Hotel Cancun - Managed by Kempinski elegant rooms feature a mini bar and work desk. All rooms have a balcony with ocean views. The private bathroom includes a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer. Dining options range from traditional Asian specialties at The Sushi Bar to Mediterranean cuisine at Fantino. Indoor or outdoor dining is available and cocktails are served at the Lobby Lounge. Just 20-minutes from Cancun International Airport, the Grand Hotel Cancun - Managed by Kempinski can arrange airport and area attraction transportation. Aquaworld, offering boat trips, is 2 km away.

name: All Ritmo Cancun Resort & Water Park
address: Km. 1.5 Carretera a Puerto Juarez, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Boasting a privileged location in a beautiful corner of the Caribbean, this charming complex is the perfect choice for families travelling with children. Guests will find themselves just 22 kilometres from Cancun International Airport and just a few steps from a white sandy beach ideal for those looking for peace and tranquillity. The comfortable and spacious accommodation options offer all the necessary services and amenities to enjoy an unforgettable holiday experience. Standard suites have been decorated in a contemporary style and offer views over the garden or to the pool. The suites include vibrant colours and come with a balcony or terrace and a cosy living room ideal to share moments with the family. Visitors will be delighted by the wide selection of dining options including national and international specialities and the youngest guests may appreciate the complete entertainment programme.FarePortal

name: Paradisus Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulkan Km 16.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Perfectly situated on the soft white sand beaches of Cancun, this exclusive beach resort provides the perfect accommodations for your vacation getaway. Paradisus Cancun is a chance to experience the stunning beauty that has made Cancun an international destination in the comfort of a luxury resort on par with the highest standards of excellence. This commitment to quality is why Paradisus Cancun has been awarded Four Diamond honors since 2006 by AAA. Luxurious, spacious and elegantly decorated rooms on a pristine beach that is short 15 minutes from the airport. Whether you are on the beach, at one of the four lagoon-inspired pools, or dining in any of our nine on-site restaurants, our goal is your total satisfaction. Indulge yourself with upgraded The Reserve service, an exclusive experience for adults, families and groups with skilled concierge service, private areas and a complete list of upgraded amenities. YHI SPA with authentic wellness activities and treatments. Romance by Paradisus offers six packages meticulously designed to meet every dream.FarePortal

name: Royal Solaris Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Km 20.5, Lote 64, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: General description: Approx. 50 m from sandy beach is located the hotel Royal Solaris Cancun. At the beach, there are sun umbrellas and sun loungers free of charge available. The nearest shopping facilities are located approx. 7 m from the hotel, a supermarket can be reached after around 6 km. For evening dancing you will find a nightclub in a distance of approx. 10 km. For medical treatment in emergencies there is a hospital around 22 km away. The airport (CUN) is approx. 32 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a shuttle (for a fee). Amenities: The 7-storey beach hotel has 305 rooms in total. It offers its guests a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 11:00), a lobby with bar, 3 lifts, air conditioning, a safe (for free), theater and a free parking area. For the meals, there are three restaurants (air-conditioned). You will be warmly welcomed in both the hotel’s bars. WiFi is available for free. Room cleaning and concierge service are free of charge. Laundry / ironing service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one fresh water pool with a children´s pool integrated into the main pool. Here, there are sun umbrellas for free available. Refreshing beverages can be consumed directly at the pool bar. Meals: Breakfast from the buffet. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Fitness. A golf course is located approx. 16 km from the hotel. Spa area and massages available for a fee. Solarium, steam bath and hamam available (where applicable for a fee). Entertainment for adults: activity programme. In the outside area of the hotel there is a play area for children. Child supervision: activity programme for children (from 4 - 12 years) and babysitting (for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: American Express and Visa. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: Hideaway at Royalton Riviera Cancun, An Autograph Collection Resort, Adults Only
address: Carretera Federal 307, 77500 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Reignite meaningful connections at an adults-only aged 18+ resort where elevated experiences create memories to last a lifetime. Located only 15 minutes from Cancun International Airport, your every desire is tailor-made. From exclusive dining to private beach and pool access and luxury accommodations, our resort-within-a-resort offers a premium Riviera Cancun getaway that also affords you access to all our neighboring Royalton Riviera Cancun has to offer.Marriott

name: Oasis Palm
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km 4.5, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This property is a beachfront, 11 km away from Cancun town center, and 11 km away from Cancun International Airport. Facilities and services include 24 hr reception, air conditioning, babysitting services, bar, car parking, banquet facilities, garden, fitness facilities, non smoking property, outdoor pool, restaurant, safe box, spa and TV. Rooms feature airconditioning, safe box, alarm clock, TV, cable channels, free toiletries, shower, toilet paper. Address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km 4.5, Hotel Zone, Cancun, Mexico, 77500.WebBeds

name: Dreams Natura Riviera Cancun
address: Sm 31, Mz 03, Lote 101-21, Km 332, 77500 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Located 15 minutes away from Cancun International Airport This family-friendly beachfront resort offers guests an Unlimited-Luxury® vacation, where everything is included: 24-hour access to unlimited food and beverage options, à la carte dining with no reservations, endless activities for all ages and more. Rooms and suites feature comforts including a private balcony or terrace and a fully stocked mini-bar. Opening November 2019- Inspired by the surrounding Mayan jungle, the all-new Now Natura Riviera Cancun will offer a unique Unlimited-Luxury® experience. Facing the Caribbean Sea on a white sand beach, the 556-room resort is a short 10-mile drive from the Cancun International AirportWebBeds

name: Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort
address: Lote Rth-7-pm-ii, Lte1, Mz 1, Smz 3, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Perfectly situated in the exclusive gated community of Playa Mujeres, within a world-famous golf course, rests the stunning AAA Four Diamond Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort. This all-suite resort boasts 502 graciously appointed and luxuriously equipped suites, surrounded by secluded white sand beaches and the turquoise Caribbean Sea. Three levels of swimming pools spanning over 65,000 square feet, including two infinity pools with breathtaking ocean views, six hot tubs, a children’s pool, a water park for little ones, a water park for all ages. Located just 10 minutes from downtown Cancun and 35 minutes from Cancun International Airport, this luxurious resort provides an ideal vacation setting for couples and couples with children. At Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, guests will enjoy the benefits of Unlimited Luxury®, where everything is included and no wristband — unlimited premium drinks at any of our 13 bars and lounges, gourmet à la carte dining, room service, daily refreshed mini-bar, pool and beach wait Service. All adult guests (+18 years old) from Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort will have free flow access to Secrets Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, located next door. With 9 additional restaurant options, 7 additional bars, 2 additional pools and more! If Preferred Club room category is reserved, status and inclusions are provided in both properties!

name: Dreams Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Federal 307, Chetumal-Puerto Juarez, Benito Juarez, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: 概述 5 星級住宿 Unlimited-Luxury ® Breath taking views and exceptional service! 典雅設計和裝飾 一應俱全的度假村 位置 地處美麗的 Puerto Morelos,位置絕佳. 休閒娛樂 戶外游泳池 Beachfront resort 水上運動 Live entertainment 戶外活動 全套放鬆身心的水療服務 設備齊全的健身中心 Outdoor hot tub 兒童 提供兒童俱樂部 餐廳與休息室 9 Restaurants 6 酒吧 服務 24 小時客房服務 24 小時禮賓服務，滿足您的所有需求 會議設施 提供婚禮場地 宴會設施 活動設施 Multiple conference/meeting rooms 住宿 486 間客房. 豪華客房WebBeds

name: Sensira Resort & Spa Riviera Maya
address: KM 27.5 Carr. Cancún - Tulum Mz 40 Lt 16, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Puerto Morelos, 21 km from Cancun Underwater Museum, Sensira Resort & Spa Riviera Maya All Inclusive provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 5-star resort offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. There is a hot tub, nightclub and a kids' club. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Sensira Resort & Spa Riviera Maya All Inclusive each room comes with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Guests can enjoy playing billiards and tennis, or take advantage of the business centre. Beto Avila Stadium is 28 km from Sensira Resort & Spa Riviera Maya All Inclusive, while Cancun Government Palace is 29 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 16 km from the resort.

name: Grand Oasis Palm
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 4.5, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Grand Oasis Palm is everything you want in a family vacation. We will play with the little ones while you take a break, we have lots of ways for grown ups to relax while kids have fun. Located in the hotel zone, by the beach, 200 m from ferry dock, 4 km from a golf course, 5 km from Cancun center and 21 km from Cancún international airport. Facilities and services include restaurants, bars, swimming pool, children's pool, mini club, children's playground, gym, tennis court (extra charge), spa (extra charge), wireless Internet access (extra charge), meeting/conference room, parking, elevator and 24-hour reception. Rooms feature telephone, TV, safe (extra charge), air conditioning, wireless Internet access (extra charge), hairdryer and bathroom. Address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km 4.5 Sección C Lote 1, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancun, Quintana Roo, Mexico.WebBeds

name: Hotel Dos Playas Faranda Cancún
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Km. 6.5, Hotel Zone, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Surrounded by tropical gardens and offering stunning views of the Caribbean Sea, this beachfront hotel in Cancun offers a sensible lodging choice to visitors to this beautiful area. Hotel Dos Playas Faranda Cancun is nestled in Cancun's hotel zone. Nightclubs, restaurants and shopping are just minutes away. Guests can also play golf or enjoy a variety of water sports nearby. After a swim in the outdoor pool, guests at Hotel Dos Playas Faranda Cancun can relax on the sundeck. The hotel's casual restaurant, Iguanas, serves international cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

name: Dreams Sapphire Resort & Spa
address: Super Manzana 11, Manzana 9, Lote 10, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This outstanding award-winning resort has a privileged location, situated on a wonderful landscape and offering a spectacular view of the Caribbean Sea. The property is set in Puerto Morelos, a famous fishing village located at only 35km from Cancun, where visitors can find multiple leisure options such as exciting excursions and water activities as well as a wide range of restaurants and cafes. This hotel offers a world of luxury to its guests with spacious and elegant rooms equipped with a private balcony or a terrace and a complimentary mini-bar refreshed daily with soft drinks and bottled water. Travellers will find unlimited activities for their entertainment as well as a spa offering the most advanced treatments. Guests can choose between six different restaurants offering a huge variety of international cuisine and various bars and lounges where they can taste a delicious cocktail.FarePortal

name: Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun, Gourmet All Inclusive by Karisma
address: Carretera Cancun Puerto Morelos km 27.5, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Puerto Morelos on Bahia Petempich Beach, this 5-star resort features a renowned Gourmet Inclusive service, contemporary Caribbean-style suites, all of them including a hot tub, plus a full-service spa. It also boasts 3 outdoor pools. Every suite at the Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun offers a canopy bed, air conditioning and a balcony overlooking the ocean or gardens. The minibar is stocked daily, plus a coffee maker is included. The elegant bathrooms provide deluxe bathrobes, rain showers, marbled double sinks and a hairdryer. The Gourmet Inclusive service includes 6 different restaurants and bars. The casual-elegant restaurants offer author cuisine, which features unique courses designed by a renowned chef; world cuisine, Italian, Caribbean, Mexican. The bars include a place specialized in mojitos, cantina-style venues and a lounge serving international drinks. Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun also offers meeting and banquet facilities that can host up to 200 guests are also part of this resort's facilities. The 13,000-square-foot Vassa Spa and health club provides a fully-equipped gym and 18-foot rock climbing tower. A variety of classes are available at the resort including cooking, dancing and yoga.

name: Dreams Jade Resort & Spa
address: Unidad 26, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Set right on a stunning sandy beach and surrounded by a beautiful landscape of crystal blue waters, this spectacular holiday resort offers a unique experience of complete luxury on the Mexican coast. The complex is situated at just a 10-minute drive away from Puerto Morelos and lies between the city of Cancun and Playa del Carmen. The guest rooms are fitted with a beautiful Mediterranean decoration and top-notch amenities such as a private balcony, free Internet access and an iPod docking station. When it comes for dining, travellers can choose between different culinary options including local and international dishes. There is also a great selection of bars and lounges where visitors may taste some delicious drinks. The hotel offers a wide range of entertainment venues for all ages, including a kids' club, activities for teens, game courts and a spa where guests may indulge themselves with the latest treatments.FarePortal

name: Hilton Cancun, an All-Inclusive Resort
address: Carretera Federal 307 Cancun-Tulum, 77569 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: No description found
